SELECT A.CUST_ID custId , A.DEPT_ID deptId , A.USER_ID userId , A.USER_NAME userName , A.AUTH_SEQ authSeq , A.GRADE grade , B.DEPT_NAME deptName , C.BIZ_NAME bizName , A.MASTER_YN masterYn , A.USER_MAIN_PAGE userMainPage , C.CUST_TYPE_CODE custTypeCode , A.MOBILE , A.EMAIL FROM ( SELECT CUST_ID, DEPT_ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, AUTH_SEQ, GRADE, MASTER_YN, USER_MAIN_PAGE, MOBILE, EMAIL FROM T_USER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWD = #{passwd}
) A INNER JOIN T_CUST_DEPT B ON A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_CUST_MST C ON A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.AUTH_SEQ authSeq , B.MENU_SEQ menuSeq , B.AUTH_TYPE authType , B.READ_YN readYn , B.WRITE_YN writeYn , B.EDIT_YN editYn , B.DELETE_YN deleteYn , B.PRINT_YN printYn , C.MENU_CODE menuCode , C.MENU_NAME menuName , C.PARENT_SEQ parentSeq , C.DEPTH , C.PAGE_URL pageUrl , MANUAL1_TYPE manual1Type , REPLACE(MANUAL1_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') manual1Url , MANUAL2_TYPE manual2Type , REPLACE(MANUAL2_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') manual2Url , MANUAL3_TYPE manual3Type , REPLACE(MANUAL3_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') manual3Url , TUTORIAL1_TYPE tutorial1Type , REPLACE(TUTORIAL1_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') tutorial1Url , TUTORIAL2_TYPE tutorial2Type , REPLACE(TUTORIAL2_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') tutorial2Url , TUTORIAL3_TYPE tutorial3Type , REPLACE(TUTORIAL3_URL, '/NAS/upload/guide/', '') tutorial3Url FROM ( SELECT AUTH_SEQ FROM T_AUTH WHERE AUTH_SEQ = #{authSeq} ) A INNER JOIN T_AUTH_MENU B ON A.AUTH_SEQ = B.AUTH_SEQ AND B.READ_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_MENU C ON B.MENU_SEQ = C.MENU_SEQ AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.ASORT ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER SET LAST_LOGIN_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
